activities: Business Data and Human Resources Data received from the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. For purposes of this certification, Business Data means the business and personal contact information and image of European BMW Group employees, consultants or vendors, transmitted to or accessed via a BMW Group network, system or application. Human Resources Data is personal information about employees, prospective employees and former employees of a European BMW Group entity; as well as their dependents and beneficiaries, that is transferred to, or accessed via a BMW MC or BMW Group network, system or application for processing.
contacttitle1: Data Privacy Protection Manager - Americas Region
